document.full_text: plans for nuclear power investment in the united states will be sidelined but not derailed by the problems japan is having with the fukushima nuclear plant, experts said in a panel discussion on thursday.
document.title: u.s. nuclear investment to pause: analysts
lines_and_colors: plans for nuclear power investment in the united states will be sidelined but not derailed by the problems japan is having with the fukushima nuclear plant, experts said in a panel discussion on thursday.
